title: Finish Nuxt 3 documentation
description: Complete the official Nuxt 3 documentation by the end of the week.

title: Implement Pinia store
description: Set up a Pinia store for state management in Nuxt 3.

title: Design user interface
description: Create the user interface with Tailwind CSS for the to-do list app.

title: Test functionality
description: Test the app to ensure all features are working as expected.

title: Deploy to production
description: Deploy the to-do list app to production and make it live.

title: Fix authentication issues
description: Resolve the issues with user authentication on the app.

title: Add user roles
description: Implement user roles (admin, user) for access control in the app.

title: Update app dependencies
description: Check and update outdated dependencies in the project.

title: Refactor codebase
description: Refactor the codebase to improve readability and performance.

title: Create user guide
description: Write the user manual for the app to help users get started.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure continuous integration and delivery pipeline for the app.

title: Add dark mode support
description: Implement dark mode for the user interface.

title: Write unit tests
description: Write unit tests for the main components of the app.

title: Optimize performance
description: Work on optimizing the app's performance for better speed.

title: Implement pagination
description: Add pagination for the to-do list items to improve UI performance.

title: Add search functionality
description: Implement search functionality to filter to-do items.

title: Fix bug in notifications
description: Fix the bug in the notification system where alerts are not triggered.

title: Improve security features
description: Work on improving the app's security features, including encryption.

title: Update database schema
description: Update the database schema to support new features in the app.

title: Add file upload feature
description: Implement file upload functionality for users to add attachments to tasks.
